LAGOSUS Lake information

Source: R/LAGOSUS-package.R
locus_information.Rd

LAGOSUS Lake information

Details

lagoslakeidLAGOS sourced unique identifier for the focal lake
lake_nhdidthe unique 'Permanent_identifier' from the NHD for each LAGOS lake
lake_nhdfcodeNHD five-digit integer code with feature code plus additional characteristics/values
lake_nhdftypeNHD three-digit integer code providing a unique identifier of feature type for the waterbody
lake_reachcodeNHD reachcode for stream reach intersecting the lake from NHD stream network
lake_namegnislake name from the gnis database
lake_namelagoslake name from a combination of data sources (gnis, wqp, etc.)
♦flag indicating zone is adjacent to or crosses the border with Canada or Mexico
lake_ismultipartflag indicating that the focal lake polygon is multipart
lake_missingwsflag indicating that the lake's watershed (ws or nws) was not delineated
lake_shapeflagflag indicating lake polygon shape is excessively angular (e.g., triangle, rectangle) or elongate (very thin relative to length)
lake_lat_decdeglatitude of centroid of the NHD lake polygon in decimal degrees (NAD83)
lake_lon_decdeglongitude of centroid of the NHD lake polygon in decimal degrees (NAD83)
lake_centroidstateabbreviation of state containing the lake centroid
lake_statesabbreviation(s) of state(s) intersecting the zone polygon
lake_huc12HUC12 of the WBD HU12 watershed containing the lake
buff100_zoneidunique 100m buffer zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
buff500_zoneidunique 500m buffer zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
ws_zoneidunique zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
nws_zoneidunique zone identifier equivalent to the focal lake lagoslakeid assigned by LAGOS
hu12_zoneidunique HU12 zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
hu8_zoneidunique HU8 zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
hu4_zoneidunique HU4 zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
county_zoneidunique county zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
state_zoneidunique state zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
epanutr_zoneidunique EPA Nutrient Ecoregion zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
omernik3_zoneidunique Omernik Level III Ecoregion zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
wwf_zoneidunique WWF zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
mlra_zoneidunique Major Land Resource Area zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
bailey_zoneidunique Bailey Ecoregion zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
neon_zoneidunique NEON zone identifier assigned by LAGOS for zone containing the focal lake
